weather.question: I fall from the sky, and I make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 You need an umbrella when I fall!
🌧️ I come from clouds.
☔ Sometimes I can be light and other times very heavy.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and I keep you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 You can see me during the day.
💛 I make the plants grow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am very bright!

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me!
⛄ I am made of tiny ice crystals.
🧣 You need to wear a hat and gloves when I am around!

weather.question: I am a cloud that is very dark and loud. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can make lightning!
⛈️ I make a rumbling sound.
☔ You should stay inside when I come!

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees and help sailboats sail. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 You can't see me, but you can feel me.
🪁 I can blow your hair around.
🌬️ Sometimes I am gentle, and sometimes I am strong.

weather.question: Sometimes I am white, and sometimes I am gray, and I float in the sky all day. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like animals.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌧️ I can bring rain.

weather.question: I am frozen rain. I can hurt if I fall on your head. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am like little ice balls.
🤕 You don't want to be outside when I fall.
⚾ I can be small or large, like a ball.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I come before the thunder.
⚡ I am very bright!
🌩️ I can be dangerous.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky, made when the sun shines through the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🌞 You can only see me when the sun is out and it's raining.
🍀 Some people say there's gold at the end of me.

weather.question: I am very cold and sometimes make the roads slippery. I am like a mix of rain and snow. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can be icy.
🥶 Be careful driving around me.
🌨️ I'm not quite snow but not quite rain, something in between.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange and crunchy
🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me
🌱 I grow under the soil

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I come in many colors
🐝 Bees collect nectar from me
🌷 I can be put in a vase

plant.question: I am tall and have leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am big and strong
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall
🐿️ Squirrels climb on me

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a vine. You can make yummy sauce with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often used in pizza
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow
🍝 My sauce is great on pasta

plant.question: I am long and green and grow in a pod. You can eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🫛 I snap when you break me
👧 Children sometimes hide me under their napkin
🥗 I am good in a salad

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels like to bury me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I am crunchy
🐿️ Squirrels save me for winter
⛏️ Nutcrackers crack me open

plant.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin. I grow on a vine and I am brown and green. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am small and oval-shaped
🥄 You can scoop me out with a spoon
✈️ New Zealand is known for growing me

plant.question: I am a grain that grows in tall stalks. You can pop me and eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I taste great with butter and salt
🌽 Chickens like to eat me
🔥 I make a 'pop' sound when heated

plant.question: I am a plant that has sharp needles instead of leaves. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long
🎁 People hang ornaments on me
🐻 Bears don't like climbing me!

plant.question: I am a big vegetable with many layers. You have to peel me to eat me, and I can make you cry. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have a strong smell
😭 Cutting me can make your eyes water
🍔 I am often put on burgers
